mapper.select: SELECT NEWSREPLYNO, NREPARENTNO, NEWSRETEXT, NEWSREDATE, NEWSREDELETE, NEWSNO, ID, NICK, LEVEL FROM B_NEWSREPLY START WITH nReParentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR newsReplyNO=nReParentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY newsReplyNO ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT max(newsReplyNO)+1 FROM B_NEWSREPLY
INSERT INTO B_NEWSREPLY (NEWSREPLYNO, NREPARENTNO, NEWSRETEXT, NEWSREDATE, NEWSREDELETE, NEWSNO, ID, NICK) VALUES(#{newsReplyNO}, #{nReParentNO}, #{newsReText}, sysdate, '', #{newsNO}, #{id}, #{nick})
mapper.update: UPDATE B_NEWSREPLY SET NREPARENTNO=#{nReParentNO}, NEWSRETEXT=#{newsReText}, NEWSREDATE=sysdate, NEWSREDELETE='', NEWSNO=#{newsNO}, ID=#{id}, NICK=#{nick} WHERE NEWSREPLYNO=#{newsReplyNO}
